<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-col>
      <PostCard />
    </v-col>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";

export default {
  async getPostById(id) {
    let res = await PostService.getPostById(id);
    console.log(res);
  },
};
</script>
